topic.title: Increasing Memory for the Web-Based Editor

body.p: The amount of memory available for the web-based editor in Content Fusion can be controlled by setting the -Xmx JVM option. This can be set by using the OXYGEN_JAVA_OPTS environment variable.
For example, the following code in the /fusion/docker-compose.override.yml file would set the amount of available memory to 8 GB:webauthor: environment: - OXYGEN_JAVA_OTPS=-Xmx8g
